organization.description:
Jackson North Community Mental Health Center (Jackson North CMHC) is a community-based, multi-service that provides comprehensive behavioral healthcare services for co-occurring adults and children with severe persistent mental illness and substance abuse problems. These services are provided for residents in the north and northwestern sections of Miami-Dade County. 

The Center specializes in the provision of:
 
* Adult Mental Health and Substance Abuse Services
* Adult Case Management
* Psychosocial Rehabilitation Services 
* Children's Mental Health and Substance Abuse Services
* Children's Case Management Services
* Individual and Group Therapy 
* Crisis Stabilization and Detoxification Services
* Anger and Stress Management 
* Adult and Child Medication Management
* Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF)
organization.name: JACKSON COMMUNITY MENTAL HEALTH CENTER
